Experience SAP FI Consultant IBM India Pvt Ltd February 2015  – Present (7 months) 
•	Ticket resolution and answering how-to questions 
•	Responsible for detailed problem determination of issues escalated from Level-1.  
•	Problem determination includes re-creating the issues, determining the point of failure by stepping through the ABAP Code and identifying the problem resolution.  
•	If the resolution is a major development or configuration fix, provide the necessary change detail to Level 3.  
•	To have the deepest level of application or product understanding.  
•	Able to understand both the standard application features (i.e. out of the box functionality) as well as the detailed components of the customized features.  
•	Responsible for making changes, migrating them, completing the ticket and communicating the change to the business. 
 Senior SAP Test Engineer Wipro Technoligies September 2014  –  February 2015  (6 months) Bengaluru Area, India Responsibilities: 
 
•	Understanding the functional specifications of all the CR for the release. 
•	Preparing test cases based on the functional specs. 
•	Preparing test for the test cases. 
•	System integration testing for the test cases prepared based upon the functional specifications. 
•	Raising and managing defects arising out of testing . 
•	Regression testing after the system integration testing is over and checking it the test cases are meeting the requirement of checking the functionality  
 
 SAP FI Consultant IBM India Pvt Ltd October 2011  –  September 2014  (3 years) Bengaluru Area, India Responsibilities:

Summary Over 5 years experience in SAP Financial module. Involved in SAP FI implementation and electronic bank statements integration. 
Over 2 years experience in SAP IPM module. Involved in full life cycle implementation of SAP IPM for international and domestic digital media and television distribution. 
I have gained experience working with the businesses located in EU countries as well as in US, mainly through business processes analysis, system configuration, testing, end users training, support and SAP users' problems resolution. 
Key skills: 
- Identifying business requirements  
- Leading workshops 
- Identifying interface and conversion requirements 
- Creating Specifications based on functional requirements 
- Business blueprint preparation 
- System configuration 
- Data migration 
- Preparation and completion of integration, quality and acceptance tests 
- Preparation of test scenarios, test data and execution of test plans 
- Building training materials and training end-users 
 
Specialties: SAP Financial Accounting,
